name: A Hallway - Extended Edition
description:
The most terrifying hallway, now extended and scarier than ever

A Hallway: Extended Edition is an extended version of the super scary hallway simulator: A Hallway. The goal is to simply reach the end, which is easier said than done. It is the prequel and teaser game to Magic Chicken Studios' next game: HappyTown (details coming soon).

Features

  • 5 hallways
  • 1 room
  • 2 secret rooms
  • Super scary
  • Retains the patented "scary hallway" feel
  • Very atmospheric

**NOTE** the ending is intentional  ;)
